text: Mark Jensen (12 October 1960 - 1 February 2021) was a Canadian luger. He competed in the men's singles event at the 1980 Winter Olympics. He was born in Toronto, Ontario. Jensen died on 1 February 2021 in Toronto, aged 60.Mark Jenson ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Canada Category:Sportspeople from Toronto Category:Lugers
title: Mark Jensen (luger)
